CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 9, 1957, page A11, reads: "Ambassador's Ball - The Hon. Homer S. Brown, judge of the country courts, and his charming wife were among the special guests invited to a ball Sunday night at the Penn-Sheraton Hotel. The event was in honor of His Excellency, Abba Eban, Israelian Ambassador to America. Left to right: Judge Brown, the Hon. George Bloom, Mrs. Brown and Mr. and Mrs. Louis J. Reizenstein. - Teenie Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Judge Homer S. Brown, Judge George Bloom, Wilhelmina Byrd Brown, Louis J. Reizenstein, and Florence Reizenstein gathered for Israeli Ambassador Abba Solomon Eban ball at Penn Sheraton Hotel
